hymn.title: Did the mountains and the trees just happen

layout.singingstanza: Did the moun -- tains and the trees just hap -- pen? Were the flow -- ers [skip1] al -- ways there? Did the stars put them -- selves in the sky? God put them there.

lyrics.stanza: Did the mountains and the trees just happen? Were the flowers always there? Did the stars put themselves in the sky? No! God put them there.
Did the lions and the bears just happen? Were the birds always in the air? Did the fish put themselves in the sea? No! God put them there.
